english.segment1: I am an arrow, I am a rocket. I am a river and nothing can stop it. Cause You are the target and You are the atmosphere. You are the ocean that keeps pulling me, You're pulling me here
english.segment2: (Chorus:). And I, can't get away, can't get away. Can't get away, can't get away. I can't get away, can't get away..I keep running into You. (repeat)
english.segment3: I am a beggar, You are the table. I am so helpless, God You are so able. And when I get turned around You change my direction. You're so perfect, I'm so broken, here You come with arms wide open. Chasing after me down every road. You're always waiting there
english.segment5: Even when I close my eyes, I can't help but see. There's no place that I can hide, You're such a part of me. I can't get away cause I keep running into You. I can't get away..
